body.p: Profiling attribute values can be configured using a Subject Scheme Map that is referenced in the context DITA map or by configuring the values in the Options Preferences Attributes and Condition Sets preferences page within an Oxygen XML Editor/Author desktop version and then exporting the options to be used with the application server. Profiling attribute groups are also supported by the server.
The code is interpreted by the Python engine.
A better user experience was ensured by incorporating accessibility during the design process.
The layout can be configured from the Preferences page.
The default path can be configured in the Ant preferences page.
The test was passed by most students.
The money was stolen by her husband.
